title: Diving Coaching Simulation Training Using Constraint-Led Approach (CLA)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Need for personalized simulations considering learners’ individual physical education experiences

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of CLA (Constraints-Led Approach) – task/environment/individual constraints – through mathematical modeling
Learners can systematically analyze constraints for diving tasks in a VR simulation environment
Learners can design CLA-based training programs and develop implementation plans in real coaching scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
